p.d: Exterior, daytime. Dom Juan and his valet Sganarelle drag the body of a priest through the countryside and bury it. Interior, night-time. In a Parisian hotel, Dom Juan, naked, wanders wearily through an orgy he himself organised. A tearful Elvire suddenly appears and demands an explanation. Directed by: Vincent Macaigne (France, 2015) Screenplay: Vincent Macaigne, based on the play "Dom Juan or the Feast of Stone", by Moliere Cast: Gérard Giroudon (the Commander), Alain Lenglet (the Priest), Julie Sicard (Charlotte), LoIc Corbery (Dom Juan), Serge Bagdassarian (Sganarelle), Clément Hervieu-Léger (Elvire's brother), Gilles David (the Beggar), Suliane Brahim (Elvire), Jérémy Lopez (Pierrot), Claire de La Rüe du Can (Mathurine) Genre: drama
